bibl.title: Decision Points in Past, Present, and Future New Testament Textual Criticism.
Eldon Jay EPP, Perspectives on New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays, 1962-2004 = Supplements to Novum Testamentum. 116
bibl.author: EPP, Eldon Jay

bibl.note: Reproduit de: Eldon Jay EPP and George W. MacRAE † (Edd.), The New Testament and Its Modern Interpreters (Philadelphia - Atlanta, Georgia, 1989) pp. 75-106, où l'article est intitulé: Textual Criticism. - Pp. 282-283: Added Notes, 2004.
EPP Eldon Jay, Decision Points in Past, Present, and Future New Testament Textual Criticism.
Eldon Jay EPP, Perspectives on New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays, 1962-2004 = Supplements to Novum Testamentum. 116 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 227-283.
